Texts.Eng: Have you ever stopped to think at just how many coincidences occurred to get you to this specific point in time?
I am not a slug. Not in the conventional sense, at any rate. I must state, though, that I am at least genetically linked to them.
I should probably find a better communications specialist for my Staff. Someone who can make sense of this strange transmission we found...
I'd love to chat about science at just about any time. Except right now. I'm too hungry.
I'm not sure if you noticed, but my large size means I require rather absurd amounts of nutrients.
It's not that I am not brave, or have no backbone...I just can't seem to get the motivation to fire Kevin.
You should definitely make regular use of your ^orange;Tricorder^reset;. It will help you in many ways.
